import React from "react"; import { OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Dropdown, MenuItem } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { outlookFetchMeesage } from "../OutlookActions"; import { Moment, HtmlRender } from "../../../common/utils/components"; class OutlookDetail extends React.Component { currentMessage = null; componentDidMount() { if (this.currentMessage !== this.props.match.params.id) { this.props.dispatch(outlookFetchMeesage(this.props.match.params.id)); this.currentMessage = this.props.match.params.id; } } render() { const message = this.props.message; return (

{message.subject} {message.folder} Print} >

{message.contact.name} <{message.contact.email}>to me on
Reply Reply Forward Print
  • Mark as spam! Delete forever
    • {message.attachments && message.attachments.length ? (
    {message.attachments.length} attachment(s) — Download all attachments
      {message.attachments.map((attachment, idx) => { return (
    • {!!attachment ? ( ) : ( )}
      {attachment.name}
      {attachment.size}
      Download | View
      • ); })}
    ) : null}
    Related Invoice
    • #4831 - Paid
    • #4835 - Unpaid
    Upcoming Meetings

    Agenda Review @ 10 AM

    Client Meeting @ 2:30 PM

    Salary Review @ 4:00 PM

    • 1 more
    ); } } export default connect(state => state.outlook)(OutlookDetail);
